thread.title: Hong Kong Airlines Sponsors FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix 2015Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Airlines Sponsors FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hong Kong Airlines Sponsors FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Hong Kong Airlines Sponsors FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix 2015 Published on : Saturday, July 18, 2015
HK 2015, the most popular international women’s volleyball competition in town, will be held from tomorrow to 18th of July, 2015. Four prominent teams: China, USA, Japan and Thailand will compete for the Hong Kong leg winner title. As a prelude to the fierce competitions, Hong Kong Airlines, one of the sponsors of this event, sent a team of flight attendants to have an exciting friendly match “Hong Kong Airlines Challenge Cup” today with representatives of four outstanding national women’s volleyball teams.
Hong Kong Airlines always supports local sport development. Following the sponsorship of “Hong Kong Dragon Boat Carnival” in early July, it now sponsors another major sports event in Hong Kong – “FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix – HK 2015”. Mr. Li Dianchun, Commercial Director of Hong Kong Airlines said, “Hong Kong Airlines is glad to sponsor “FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix” which attracts the attention of worldwide audiences. What’s more exciting is that our energetic flight attendants just had a friendly match with the captains of four leading women’s volleyball team. In spite of the disparity in volleyball skills, the superlative performance of our flight attendants impressed the audiences and showed the spirit of Hong Kong.”
Gathering volleyball talents from around the world in Hong Kong, audiences can enjoy some of the world’s top-ranking national teams facing each other off in 3-day intense competition. To boost excitement in the event, a game booth will be set up where the audiences can win amazing prizes. Complimentary air tickets will also be given out to lucky participants. Let’s join us and witness the birth of the champion!
Source:- Hong Kong Airlines
